awards:
第38届马德普拉塔电影节(2023)
　　国际竞赛单元 最佳长片奖(提名) 金泰阳

　　第61届百想艺术大赏(2025)
　　最佳新人女演员(提名) 李明河

　　第25届全州国际电影节(2024)
　　韩国电影竞赛单元 评审团大奖(提名) 金泰阳
introduction: More than once, the protagonists in Mimang wonder where they are and where they’re going—it is a concrete, geographical question born from walking around the streets of Seoul, but as the film progresses, that urban journey also proves to be an existential one. We accompany the characters in some stretches of their path—many years separate each of the episodes that make up the film, and that distance reveals changes through what remains. This is not a film about earthquakes, but about small transformations, and the marks of time can be seen not only in the actors’ bodies, but also in that other omnipresent protagonist that is Seoul, whose vitality invades every shot. Like others before him (it’s inevitable to think about Truffaut or Linklater), here, Kim Taeyang reminds us that cinema is the best time machine that has been invented so far.源自：https://www.mardelplatafilmfest.com/38/en/pelicula/mimang
